overview: Behind The Scenes produced in Sept 2021, It is a drama, social , romantic film. Dr Mona hard working University teacher, Mr. Rashid compete and envy Dr Mona on her super activities, There is a romantic relationship between two students Ahmad and Rana, Haifa likes Ahmad and envy Rana, Dr Mona will initiates a competition for her students, she struggle for the rights and the truth, There will be unexpected conspiracy at the end, The film send humanity messages through poems and lectures by students.
title: Behind the Scenes
